column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Unfortunately we weren't able to spend much time in here except to peek at a few sculptures. However
column2: would love to visit again to be able to see some Monet
column3: Degas and van Gogh and their take on impressionism. And continuing on that note
column4: it would be an honour to experience seeing the contemporary artworks of Dal√≠
column6: and Warhol. Not even slightly ashamed by all the name-dropping. It would be amazing to be able to stand and bask in their talent. In addition to their permanent exhibits
column7: they also have changing special exhibits too- which I'm sure would be just as good as the stuff they keep 24/7/365.
